pages.text: After being a Umamusume, You can wear various types of clothing designed specifically for Umamusume. Because of the Umamusume's likeness, it makes sense to wear their costumes. $(p)Villagers have some clothing for Umamusume, After all, the number of Umamusume is also increasing. $(p) In addition to buying costumes from the villagers, you can also go ahead and make some costumes yourself.
It still gets a little cold in the winter.
